alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 25 at 9:22PM CST until January 27 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CST SATURDAY FOR EAST CENTRAL GRUNDY AND SOUTHWESTERN WILL COUNTIES... At 922 PM CST, emergency management reported the break up of an ice jam on the Kankakee River near Wilmington may be imminent which will result in flash flooding downstream. HAZARD...Flash flooding from an ice jam. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Flooding of structures possible. Flooding of additional roads and streets is expected. Shifting ice and dangerous ice flows may damage structures along the shore. If ice jam break up occurs, the flood wave will move down the Kankakee River from Wilmington to Phelan Acres. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: A Flash Flood Warning means rapid-onset flooding is imminent. Persons along the lower Kankakee River should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.
